Ingenosya.description: After 6 months, I was hired as a full-time Angular developer. Joined an existing cross-functional development team as an intern to contribute to an ongoing government project as an Angular developer. During the development process, I also collaborated with the backend team to help design and implement APIs and wrote some SQL queries to automated repetitive tasks. After six months, I was hired as a full-time frontend developer and assigned to a new team to work on a client project as a frontend developer ensuring seamless integration with backend services. Assisted new interns in integrating into the team by providing technical guidance and onboarding support.

Relia consulting.description: Joined a small team of developers to work on a client project as a frontend developer. Worked on the frontend part of the project to ensure seamless integration with backend services. Assisted in the development of a web application using Angular, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with the backend team to help design and implement APIs.
